orbitpy.util — Utility functions, classes¶

synopsis

Utilities

class orbitpy.util.Constants[source]¶

Enumeration of various constants used by package OrbitPy. Unless indicated otherwise, the constants are in S.I. units.

class orbitpy.util.EnumEntity[source]¶

Enumeration of recognized types.

class orbitpy.util.PropagationCoverageParameters(sat_id=None, epoch=None, sma=None, ecc=None, inc=None, raan=None, aop=None, ta=None, duration=None, cov_grid_fl=None, sen_type=None, sen_orien=None, sen_clock=None, sen_cone=None, step_size=None, sat_state_fl=None, sat_acc_fl=None, gnd_stn_fl=None)[source]¶

Data structure holding propagation and coverage parameters.
